title: Everything You Need to Know About Prismarine Crystals in Minecraft

steps.title: Prismarine Crystals drop as mob loot.
steps.content: Prismarine Crystals drop as mob loot. Guardians and Elder Guardians can drop Prismarine Crystals upon defeat . [1] X Research source Guardians are aquatic enemy mobs that spawn around ocean monuments . Elder Guardians are a stronger variant of the Guardian, and they can also be found in ocean monuments. Guardians have a 40% chance of dropping a Prismarine Crystal as loot. Elder Guardians have a 33% chance of dropping a Prismarine Crystal as loot.

steps.title: Prismarine Crystals can be mined from Sea Lanterns.
steps.content: Prismarine Crystals can be mined from Sea Lanterns. Sea Lanterns are found in ocean monuments and underwater ruins. [2] X Research source If you break a Sea Lantern while using a tool that does not have Silk Touch, you will get 2 to 3 Prismarine Crystals. If you have the Fortune enchantment , you can get up to 5. If you break a Sea Lantern with a Silk Touch tool, you'll get a Sea Lantern and not the crystals.

steps.title: Prismarine Crystals naturally generate in buried treasure chests.
steps.content: Prismarine Crystals naturally generate in buried treasure chests. You can find buried treasure chests on beaches or the ocean floor. In Java Edition, you have a 59.9% chance to find Prismarine Crystals in a buried treasure chest, and you can find anywhere from 1 to 5 crystals in the chest. In Bedrock Edition, you have a 18.9% chance to find Prismarine Crystals in a buried treasure chest, and you can find anywhere from 1 to 5 crystals in the chest.

steps.title: Prismarine Crystals are used to make Sea Lanterns.
steps.content: Prismarine Crystals are used to make Sea Lanterns. To make a Sea Lantern, you will need 5 Prismarine Crystals and 4 Prismarine Shards. Prismarine Shards can also be obtained from Guardians and Elder Guardians. To make a Sea Lantern, place a Prismarine Shard in each of the four corners of a 3x3 crafting grid, then fill the remaining 5 spots with Prismarine Crystals.
